LanguageData.PI_NeedCollars_Explaination: One or more prisoners are marked for enslavement, but you have no available slave collars. Make some from leather at a crafting spot or smithing workbench.
LanguageData.PI_MCM_Description: These settings won't take effect until you restart RimWorld.
LanguageData.PI_InstallCamera: Install a named security camera first
LanguageData.PI_MustBeInRoom: Security Camera must be placed in a walled room.
LanguageData.PI_NoColonistBeds: Security Camera can't be placed in a room with colonist beds.
